name: Mid-Light Runner
description:
Mid Light Runner
  • Game description: Mid Light Runner is a 2D sci-fi platformer that challenges players to control a hover car with their mouse and use color theory to shoot fireballs and destroy lasers. The game tests players' knowledge and reflexes as they progress through increasingly difficult levels.
Gameplay
  • Objective: The objective of the game is to progress through each level by destroying lasers of the same color as the fireball shot by the player. Players must use their knowledge of color theory and quick reflexes to select the correct color or combination of colors to destroy the lasers in their path. The game rewards players for accuracy and knowledge, encouraging them to learn and improve their skills as they progress.
  • Controls: Players control the hover car with their mouse and can shoot red, blue, or green fireballs by clicking the corresponding buttons on the keyboard.
Features
  • Color Theory: The game utilizes color theory as a core mechanic, challenging players to select the correct color or combination of colors to destroy lasers.
  • Educational: Mid Light Runner is an educational game that tests players' knowledge of color theory while also encouraging them to learn and improve their skills as they progress.
  • Fast-paced: The game is fast-paced and requires quick reflexes and strategic thinking to progress through the levels.Synopsis

Mid Light Runner is a 2D sci-fi platformer that challenges players to control a hover car with their mouse and use color theory to shoot fireballs and destroy lasers. The game tests players' knowledge and reflexes as they progress through increasingly difficult levels, rewarding them for accuracy and knowledge while also encouraging them to learn and improve their skills. With fast-paced gameplay and educational mechanics, Mid Light Runner is the perfect game for players who want to test their skills and expand their knowledge of color theory.
